title: LLM Image Analysis App
description: A Next.js application that uses Google Generative AI (Gemini model) to analyze uploaded images, providing descriptions, related questions, and keywords in Turkish.

title: Simple Scraping Example
description: A Jupyter Notebook project for web scraping and analyzing legal questions and answers, featuring synchronous and asynchronous scraping methods.

title: Poem Generator
description: A web application that generates poems based on user prompts using OpenAI's GPT-3.5 model, with a Go backend and Streamlit frontend.

title: MLOps Tutorial with Dockerized Flask App
description: A project demonstrating CI/CD automation for a Flask app using Docker, PyTest, and GitHub Actions to ensure efficient deployment to Docker Hub.
